content:
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Brooklyn Nine-Nine is a fantastic show, and I think you'll have a blast watching it with your roommates.

If you enjoy Brooklyn Nine-Nine, here are some new TV shows and movies that you might enjoy:

**TV Shows:**

1. **Abbot Elementary** (Hulu): A mockumentary-style sitcom about a group of teachers at a public school in Philadelphia. It's got a similar tone and humor to Brooklyn Nine-Nine.
2. **The Other Two** (Comedy Central): A comedy series about two struggling performers who are overshadowed by their more successful siblings. It's got a similar absurd humor and features many of the same comedic actors as Brooklyn Nine-Nine.
3. **Ramy** (Hulu): A comedy-drama series about a first-generation American Muslim living in New Jersey. It's got a similar heart and humor to Brooklyn Nine-Nine, and explores similar themes of identity and community.
4. **Superstore** (NBC): A workplace comedy about the employees at a big-box store. It's got a similar ensemble cast and humor to Brooklyn Nine-Nine.

**Movies:**

1. **The Heat** (2013): An action-comedy starring Sandra Bullock and Melissa McCarthy as two mismatched detectives. It's got a similar buddy-cop vibe to Brooklyn Nine-Nine.
2. **Central Intelligence** (2016): An action-comedy starring Dwayne Johnson and Kevin Hart as two old high school friends who team up to stop a villain. It's got a similar blend of humor and action to Brooklyn Nine-Nine.
3. **Game Night** (2018): A comedy-mystery movie about a group of friends who get caught up in a real-life mystery game. It's got a similar blend of humor and suspense to Brooklyn Nine-Nine.
4. **Good Boys** (2019): A coming-of-age comedy about three sixth-grade friends who are invited to their first kissing party. It's got a similar humor and heart to Brooklyn Nine-Nine.

These shows and movies all share some of the same elements that make Brooklyn Nine-Nine so great, like a talented ensemble cast, witty dialogue, and a mix of humor and heart. I think you'll find something you enjoy!

Let me know if you have any other questions or if there's anything else I can help you with. Happy watching!
